text.title: Host a Party in an Apartment Without Getting Busted or Thrown Out

head.s: Host a Party in an Apartment Without Getting Busted or Thrown Out

p.s: You 've hosted a party , favorite lite beverage in hand , drinking games ‘ round the round table , and some intense music that was carrying to the building over , when suddenly around 3:20 a. m. , a knock at the door by the local “ proud to protect and serve ” asking you to break it up ( and shut it up ) .
Time to think on a better party-throwing method to head off homelessness .

Be sure and keep these tips from
http://www.apartmenthomeliving.com
in mind before you throw another busted party .

item.s: This may be a bit more difficult than simply calling everyone up at 7 p.m. for a party at 9 , but it 's well worth it .

figure.rend: Host a Party in an Apartment Without Getting Busted or Thrown Out Step 1.jpg

list.item:
Keep down the sound
.
If you keep down the sound , you ’ll keep down the citations .

item.s: Do n't order a lot of delivery food .
If the apartment building does n't allow parties , it 's a dead giveaway when the pizza man shows up with ten large pizzas if only two people are supposed to be living in your room !

figure.rend: Host a Party in an Apartment Without Getting Busted or Thrown Out Step 3.jpg

item.s: Have your party at an earlier time .
Parties from 6pm to 10pm are much less likely to have the cops called than a party from 8pm to 2am .

figure.rend: Host a Party in an Apartment Without Getting Busted or Thrown Out Step 4.jpg

list.item:
Prepare the neighbors .
Explain to them beforehand of the party
, and if appropriate : Invite them !

item.s: A party by the pool or a grill-out can often remain a tad calmer than a party without all the outdoor distraction .

Even better-Plan a midnight
volleyball
or dodgeball game in a park close to the homestead and bring glow sticks…only Bambi and Thumper will be kept awake , and as long as you do n’t have a giant strobe light , you should be fine .
Extra hint : Stay clear of glass bottles .
Most parks do n’t allow them .

figure.rend: Host a Party in an Apartment Without Getting Busted or Thrown Out Step 6.jpg

item.s: But , it may worth taking the party to a cheap nearby Bar and Grill with live music or a juke box .
A good group of friends , great food , and a little music always means awesome times .

And the clincher of the whole thing : NO CLEANUP ! ( Remember to
tip your servers
. )

list.item:
Plan a beginning with the end in mind .
Mom used to say that nothing good happens after midnight .
She obviously has never been to a slamming after-party .
Like tip # 4 , you want to go out on the town , but still want to play host a little at your place .
Not a problem .
If you really want to insure that you wo n’t have to lay your head next to Gary , the guy under the bridge , take mom ’s advice a little and invite friends to pre-party instead of an after party .
Then head out on the town around 11 p.m.
What this accomplishes ?
An awesome start to a night out by showing off your digs , and playing host without upsetting the neighbors .
